about_the_game:
Animated Puzzles - Spooky pack

An add-on for Animated Puzzles.

This DLC contains 8 new spooky themed animated puzzles. The puzzles have three difficulties, with a higher number of pieces than our previous puzzles. The pack also includes 3 new spooky soundtracks to go with the puzzles.

In contrast to the natural and harmonious puzzles included in the main game, these are not created to make you feel good or relaxed, but rather a bit uncomfortable.

Our goal is not to scare you or give you a heart attack, after all - this is a game with a wide age range ;). They are just made to give you that dark and eerie feeling that some people tend to seek out from time to time, especially around Halloween.

NOTE regarding "soon to be 8 puzzles". Due to unforeseen circumstances, not all puzzles were ready in time, but will be uploaded as soon as we get the chance.
detailed_description:
Animated Puzzles - Spooky pack

An add-on for Animated Puzzles.

This DLC contains 8 new spooky themed animated puzzles. The puzzles have three difficulties, with a higher number of pieces than our previous puzzles. The pack also includes 3 new spooky soundtracks to go with the puzzles.

In contrast to the natural and harmonious puzzles included in the main game, these are not created to make you feel good or relaxed, but rather a bit uncomfortable.

Our goal is not to scare you or give you a heart attack, after all - this is a game with a wide age range ;). They are just made to give you that dark and eerie feeling that some people tend to seek out from time to time, especially around Halloween.

NOTE regarding "soon to be 8 puzzles". Due to unforeseen circumstances, not all puzzles were ready in time, but will be uploaded as soon as we get the chance.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: glibc 2.15+, 32/64-bit.
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8GHz or equivalent
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Yosemite 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 1500 MB RAM

name: Animated Puzzles - Spooky Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.8Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible graphics card (shader model 2)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible

short_description: Spooky puzzle pack for Animated Puzzles.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Simplified Chinese, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Swedish
